content:
I'll add "The Power" to your list. Here's the updated version:

**New Books:**

1. "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo" by Taylor Jenkins Reid
2. "The Song of Achilles" by Madeline Miller
3. "The Poppy War" by R.F. Kuang

**Currently Reading:**

1. "The Power" by Naomi Alderman (audiobook)

**Old Favorites to Re-read:**

1. "The Perks of Being a Wallflower" by Stephen Chbosky
2. "The Fault in Our Stars" by John Green

**Other Books to Read:**

(Still empty, but feel free to add more as you think of them!)

I hope you enjoy "The Power" on your morning jogs! Naomi Alderman's writing is thought-provoking, and the audiobook format can make the story even more immersive.

Have a great time at your book club meeting later today, and I hope you all have a lively discussion about "The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks"!
